comments: An excellent professor. Very helpful. I realized how great he is when I started working in Transportation Area. He teachers extremely well, but some guys are frustrated as they want something ready made to memorize to get high grades. But, Professor Habib\'s standard is very high and he gets deep into the subject. He is one of my best professo

He is an excellent professor and outstanding teacher. I dont understand why some people wrote bad things about him here. I believe they might received bad grade in his course. However, I talked to him after every class and he is super helpful professor. I found him one of my best teachers at UofA

Very dull lecture. His lecture notes are essentially screen shots of the text book pages. Going to class is not necessary, just read his notes. Also, he will screw you over on the exams: There are about a million formulas in the course, and he will randomly pick a few that you need to memorize for the exam. He is generally a nice guy to talk to
